Articles.Content: This game looks epic I keep crashing stuff but its so awesome just bought the full game. Can't wait to see where this game goes!!

Congrats on beginning your fledgeling space program! Welcome to the forums!

How in-depth are you planning to get with it? Do you wanna make space stations and land on planets or crash stuff?

(Both are fun.)

Welcome to the community Code2200

This game is going to the stars! No really! We'll eventually have a few other handmade systems and several more generated with a seed, which will be changeable and can even be random

So one day Kerbals will travel to other stars!

How cool is that?

Thanks everyone i will probably start with a few satellites then some people but I really want to build some space station. Though I'm crashing more the. Flying at the moment. More systems are awesome. I read the expansion thing and saw multiplayer is possible. I would love that more star systems as well. Just windering would more advanced tech like research come around to where eventually you could get hyperdrive or something with tons and tons of research?
thats how everyone starts. i recommend that you get an autopilot mod just to get an idea of how to do things then try them yourself

thats how everyone starts. i recommend that you get an autopilot mod just to get an idea of how to do things then try them yourself

Thanks i have watched a few videos on youtube to get a feel for it all and crashed alot of things lol. i have however got my first satellite into orbit though its not an even orbit so any pointers on that would help i ran out of fuel so idk is there a way to make sure you have enough or is it just a guessing game?

thats how everyone starts. i recommend that you get an autopilot mod just to get an idea of how to do things then try them yourself

I have been watching several youtube videos what people have made is mind blowing, but i have finally gotten a satellite into orbit its not a fully even orbit but it seems to be holding. lots of crashing happened since i ran out of fuel is there a way to make sure you have enough or is it just a guessing game? i am pleased to say that no kerbal was harmed in this launch.
